name: Fun Emoji Spinning Game
description:
Fun Emoji Spinning Game is brand new arcade game, where funny Emoticons is rolling around, trying to jump ahead.
Try all smiling faces, there is emoticon for every mood.
Easy to play - just tap the screen to make emoji jump. Easy but crazily addictive!
Let's have fun together, challenge with your friends and compare scores in leaderboard.
This new smileys game is for kids and for adults, it will keep you busy for hours!
